#pTHatBins used in JETSCAPE runs.


200 GeV : 
     pTHatMin[23] = { 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7, 9, 11, 13, 15, 17, 20, 25, 30, 35, 40, 45, 50, 55, 60, 70, 80, 90}
     pTHatMax[23] = { 2, 3, 4, 5, 7, 9, 11, 13, 15, 17, 20, 25, 30, 35, 40, 45, 50, 55, 60, 70, 80, 90, 100}

2.76 TeV :
     pTHatMin[54] = { 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7, 9, 11, 13, 15, 17, 20, 25, 30, 35, 40, 45, 50, 55, 60, 70, 80, 90, 100, 110, 120, 130, 140, 150, 160, 170, 180, 190, 200, 210, 220, 230, 240, 250, 260, 270, 280, 290, 300, 350, 400, 450, 500, 550, 600, 700, 800, 900, 1000 }

5.02 TeV :
  int pTHatMin[66] = { 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7, 9,  11, 13, 15, 17, 20, 25, 30, 35, 40, 45, 50, 55, 60, 70, 80, 90, 100, 110, 120, 130, 140,                                150, 160, 170, 180, 190, 200, 210, 220, 230, 240, 250, 260, 270, 280, 290, 300, 350, 400, 450, 500, 550, 600,
